ISO 9001: 2015 Certification indicates that an organization adheres to the international standard set by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) for Quality Management Systems.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Standards & Practices” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”32px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font=”Montserrat|600|||||||” header_text_color=”#1C3664″ header_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”Montserrat||||||||” body_text_color=”#315BA9″ body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation=”off” icon_font_size=”32px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our company continually invests in training, improvement programs, ISO 9001: 2015 certification, and new technology to assure the best quality practices, while keeping our customers and the environment in mind.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Quality Control Lab” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#D7DF23″ icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”32px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font=”Montserrat|600|||||||” header_text_color=”#1C3664″ header_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”Montserrat||||||||” body_text_color=”#315BA9″ body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation=”off” icon_font_size=”32px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our QC lab is in a completely climate-controlled environment, and our constant monitoring ensures the holding of close tolerances, resulting in the perfect finished plastic part or product.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”On-Site Experts & Testing” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_color=”#0469be” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”32px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font=”Montserrat|600|||||||” header_text_color=”#1C3664″ header_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”Montserrat||||||||” body_text_color=”#315BA9″ body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation=”off” icon_font_size=”32px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

With on-site mold testing and troubleshooting, our experienced plastics technicians are always on hand to get the job done right, and ISO 9001: 2015 best practices insure the highest quality.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Site Transparency” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#99CA3C” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”32px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font=”Montserrat|600|||||||” header_text_color=”#1C3664″ header_line_height=”1.5em” body_font=”Montserrat||||||||” body_text_color=”#315BA9″ body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation=”off” icon_font_size=”32px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Knowing you can walk into the factory at any time and see the quality, methods, and materials of work being produced, will give you the peace of mind that offshore options cannot provide.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Prompt & Dependable Service” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||400″ icon_color=”#f45721″ icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”32px” content_max_width=”100%”
